snippet: The campaign for Texas attorney general bears a resemblance to the 1998 race in which the leader also had a daunting advantage until his qualifications were questioned.
lead_paragraph: The campaign for Texas attorney general bears a resemblance to the 1998 race in which the leader also had a daunting advantage until his qualifications were questioned.

headline.main: A Contest Shifts From Ideology to Résumés
